about_the_game:
Marching across an epic overworld is a highlight of any RPG, and inevitably... enemies will besiege the characters. Make sure their battles match the splendor of the wider world with these bold battlebacks. Your monsters will appreciate inhabiting such scenic locales. Maybe once they're cleared out, you can take a nice vacation.

Features:

* 16 battlebacks in a variety of environments!
* 580 x 444 sized .png files
* BONUS musical theme "Majestic World" as heard in the trailer, .ogg & .m4a format
* For use with RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!
